title: Please Help
body: So I got an update a little while ago, and after it downloaded and the client came up again, where the play button is, it's just stuck at 0%, been like that for about 15 minutes. Are any other people having this issue as well?

replies.body: Since you're stuck at 0% without being able to get anywhere, your pc might not have the correct permission settings to let the client scan for outdated files. Go through the steps in our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and you should be able to get that client downloading.
